name: Bay Area Vanpool Program
description: Shared commute costs, HOV access, and reduced stress
fullDescription: 511.org helps commuters form and join vanpools, where groups of 5-15 people share a van for their daily commute, splitting costs and reducing traffic.
whatTheyOffer:
- Help finding or forming a vanpool
- Vanpool matching service
- Subsidies available through some employers
- Reduced commute costs compared to driving alone
- HOV lane access
- Some vanpools subsidized by MTC
howToGetIt:
1. Visit 511.org/vanpool to search for existing vanpools
2. Enter your home and work locations
3. Join an existing vanpool or start a new one
4. Split monthly costs with vanpool members
5. Many employers offer vanpool subsidies
keywords: vanpool, 511, commute, rideshare, HOV, carpool, subsidy, employer, group van, shared ride
